english.segment1: All alone in a crowded room. No place for me to fit into. Empty face with a painted smile. I don't know why
english.segment2: But when you find me in my busy streets of emptiness. Remind me Im not ever on my own
english.segment3: I don't know how you love me like you do. Its so good to belong with you. In all the places Im a stranger to. Its so good to belong with you
english.segment4: Still the same even if I try. Im in the middle but Im still outside. Can someone tell me where I went wrong. I don't understand at all
english.segment5: Is it really worth it in the end. To try time and time again. Looking for what has always been right there.
